DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose trial determine treatment rosuvastatin 10 20mg/day 8 week hypertriglyceridemic patient reduce triglyceride level .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Rosuvastatin Triglyceride Levels Mexican Hypertriglyceridemic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients older 18 year , gender , without previous treatment statin lipid lower drug least 6 month With elevated triglyceride 200 800mg/dl willing follow study procedure include assist clinic , fast blood sample sign write consent High level lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDLC ) Unstable cardiovascular condition await myocardial revascularization Congestive cardiac failure Uncontrolled diabetes Cancer Uncontrolled hypothyroidism Familial hypercholesterolemia Liver/muscle disease Pregnancy Other
